name: Riftloot
description:
Live. Loot. Ascend!

Riftloot is a roguelike/roguelite with mechanics inspired by the Match 3 genre. Select and upgrade your hero, delve into the rift, kill monsters and collect loot, find and drink health potions to survive, level up and gain perks, and ascend!
